DisablePersonalSync.title: Disable Personal Accounts
DisablePersonalSync.description: Prevents users from adding or syncing personal accounts.

DisableTutorial.title: Disable Tutorial Screens
DisableTutorial.description: Disable tutorial screens during first setup.

TenantID.title: Tenant ID
TenantID.description: The TenantID value is a string that determines the tenants to whom the default folder location setting is applicable.

DefaultFolderLocation.title: Default Folder Location
DefaultFolderLocation.description: OneDrive folder default location. Specifies the default location of the OneDrive folder for each organization.

AutomaticUploadBandwidthPercentage.title: Automatic upload bandwidth percentage
AutomaticUploadBandwidthPercentage.description: Percentage of local upload bandwidth that the sync client can use.

UploadBandwidthLimited.title: Maximum Upload Bandwidth
UploadBandwidthLimited.description: Upload throughput in KB/sec that the sync client can use.

DownloadBandwidthLimited.title: Maximum Download Bandwidth
DownloadBandwidthLimited.description: Sets the maximum download throughput rate in kilobytes (KB)/sec for computers running the OneDrive sync client.

HideDockIcon.title: Hide Dock Icon
HideDockIcon.description: Hides the OneDrive dock icon even when the application is running.

OpenAtLogin.title: Open at Login
OpenAtLogin.description: Automatically start OneDrive when the user logs in.

SharePointOnPremFrontDoorUrl.title: SharePoint Server Front Door URL
SharePointOnPremFrontDoorUrl.description: The URL of the on-premises SharePoint Server.

SharePointOnPremTenantName.title: SharePoint Server Tenant Name
SharePointOnPremTenantName.description: The name that will be used when creating a folder to sync the on-premises SharePoint Server files.

SharePointOnPremPrioritzationPolicy.title: SharePoint OnPrem Prioritization
SharePointOnPremPrioritzationPolicy.description: Determines whether or not the client should set up sync for SharePoint Server or SharePoint Online first during the first-run scenario.

EnableAddAccounts.description: Allow users to add accounts to OneDrive

FilesOnDemandEnabled.title: Enable Files On-Demand
FilesOnDemandEnabled.description: When set to true, new users who set up the sync app will download online-only files by default. When set to false, Files On-Demand will be disabled and users won't be able to turn it on.

IsHydrationToastAllowed.description: When set to false, toasts will not appear when applications trigger the download of file contents.

HydrationDisallowedApps.description:
String in JSON format. AppID can be either the BSD process name or the bundle display name. 
MaxBuildVersion denotes the maximum build version of the application that will be blocked. 
MaxBundleVersion denotes the maximum bundle version of the application that will be blocked.

EnableODIgnore.title: OneDrive Sync Ignore Rules
EnableODIgnore.description: This setting lets you enter keywords to prevent the OneDrive sync app from uploading certain files to OneDrive or SharePoint. You can enter complete names, such as "setup.exe" or use the asterisk (*) as a wildcard character to represent a series of characters, such as *.pst. Keywords aren't case-sensitive.

EnableAllOcsiClients.title: Enable All Osci Clients
EnableAllOcsiClients.description: This setting lets multiple users use the Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise, Office 2019, or Office 2016 desktop apps to simultaneously edit an Office file stored in OneDrive. It also lets users share files from the Office desktop apps.

DisableHydrationToast.title: Disable Hydration Toast
DisableHydrationToast.description: This setting prevents toasts from appearing when applications cause file contents to be downloaded.

BlockExternalSync.title: Block External Sync
BlockExternalSync.description: This setting prevents the sync app from syncing libraries and folders shared from other organizations. Set the setting's value to True, to prevent the users from syncing OneDrive, SharePoint libraries, and folders with organizations other than the user's own organization.

AllowTenantList.title: Allow Tenant List
AllowTenantList.description: This setting prevents the users from uploading files to other organizations by specifying a list of allowed tenant IDs. If you enable this setting, the user gets an error if they attempt to add an account from an organization that isn't in the allowed tenants list.

BlockTenantList.title: Block Tenant List
BlockTenantList.description: This setting prevents the users from uploading files to organizations that are included in the blocked tenant IDs list. If you enable this setting, the users get an error if they attempt to add an account from an organization that is blocked. If a user has already added an account for a blocked organization, the files stop syncing.

KFMOptInWithWizard.title: Prompt Users to Move Known Folders

KFMSilentOptInDesktop.title: Silently Opt in Desktop to Known Folders
KFMSilentOptInDesktop.description: Enable to silently opt-in the user's Desktop folder.

KFMSilentOptInDocuments.title: Silently Opt in Documents to Known Folders
KFMSilentOptInDocuments.description: Enable to silently opt-in the user's Documents folder.

KFMSilentOptInWithNotification.title: Silently Opt in with Notification
KFMSilentOptInWithNotification.description: If enabled, displays a notification to users after their folders have been redirected.

KFMBlockOptIn.title: Block Opt-in
KFMBlockOptIn.description: If enabled, will prevent KFM opt-in.

enum_titles: Prevent & Redirect Previous KFM'd Folders to the Device

KFMBlockOptOut.title: Block KFM Opt-out
KFMBlockOptOut.description: If enabled, prevents users from redirecting their known folders to the Mac.
